content: 21 round 25 working in blo 1 decrease x 6 6 fasten_off leaving a long tail for sewing after closing the ring join with a slip_stitch chain 6 and slip_stitch in next stitch 3 ears make 2 with raw yarn round 1 5 single_crochet in a magic_ring 5 round 2-3 single_crochet around 5 round 4 increase in all 5 st 10 fasten_off leaving a tail for sewing don t stuff them attach them at round 25 from body next to the chain 6 tassels make 2 with the color of election i used a multicolor yarn wrap yarn around one finger 3 times tie securely at one end with a piece of yarn cut across the other end wrap a piece of yarn tightly from tied end and fasten securely attach tassel in each ear image from yarnspirations you re done thank you for your interest in my pattern if you have any question about it don t hesitate to contact me @lapandustria_crochet @floranfetamina lapandustria@gmail com enjoy crocheting 4
